speaker: speaker1
text: Hey , Maggy , Did you hear about David ?

speaker: speaker2
text: About David ? No , I didn ’ t hear anything .

speaker: speaker1
text: You know , about David and his new boss .

speaker: speaker2
text: Sorry , I don ’ t quite follow you .

speaker: speaker1
text: Well , I heard David has been fired .

speaker: speaker2
text: Oh , that is a shame . He is really hard working .
